content.detailedDescription:
location:pawtucket, rhode island
     on july 4. 2012 at 9:30 pm i was in the backyard of my girlfriends 
   house attempting to view some of the neighborhood fireworks through the
   spaces between the trees and houses. i was successful to a small degree
   and witnessed the burst of a few small aerial fireworks.
     
     while i was waiting and watching for more,i noticed a short orange line
   emerge from behind a distant tree top. my first thought was " wow..That`s 
   one big rocket and it`s going to make one hell of a bang !". however, it
   never exploded.Instead, it continued to travel in what appeared to be an
   upward direction and then i noticed it was traveling toward me. i watched
   the slightly oblong orange glow intently as it traveled slowly across the
   sky under a thin cloud cover. i squinted to try and get a better look at
   it to see if i could make out any type of form inside the orange glow,but
   all i could see was the orange glow itself.

     there was no sound that i could detect and there were no white,green or
   red flashing lights that would have indicated to me that it was a jetliner
   or other normal aircraft. if i did detect any of these things, i would 
   have thought it was an aircraft on fire and doomed to crash any minute.
     if i had to guess, i would say it was at about 5k feet and it traveled 
   from the sw to the ne and was moving at the pace of a passenger jet. i 
   lost sight of the object when it passed behind a neighboring house. it
   never changed direction or altitude, just sailed along as if it belonged
   there. i`ve seen meteors,large and small and have watched satellites,even
   the space shuttle fly by,but it`s the first time i`ve ever seen anything
   like i have described. i wanted to call out to have someone witness it
   with me, but i figured there was no one within earshot and had i thought
   of it, i could have gone 25ft to my truck to get my binoculars. i was
   just too engrossed in the moment and didn`t want to miss any of it.
      
      as a passing note, there is an airport near by ( t.F.Green (pvd) ),
      the orange glow was traveling in a direction away from the airport.
      in fact, about 20 minutes later, a passenger jet flew over in a 
      similar direction,but towards the airport and there was no mistaking
      the lights,shape, and sound to identify it as a jet aircraft.
content.summary: Watched fuzzy orange slightly oblong glowing object travel slowly through the night sky from a sw to ne direction , no sound,no flashing lights.       y from a

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i took these pictures in kentucky, they were taken on 4/5/12 or 4/6/12, on cumberland falls rd., ky. 90, about 2.5 miles from the falls at the old bridge & lookout spot, we were looking south over the mountains, and did not see the ufo���s in the pictures, when we took them, we only noticed them when we were looking at the pictures when we got back home in ohio. the camera is a canon power shot sd1000.
i have the ufo���s circled in red in these pics. we had a funny feeling the whole time we were there.
content.summary: Noticed these images in the pictures when we got home from vacation

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4 at approx eleven pm i was standing in my back yard looking at the stars and etc  when from my right an orange orb or light appeared traveling at a slow speed.  it was relatively high in the sky but appeared to be very close to my position and yet i couldn't see any structure               associated with the light it was as if it were on fire, a frozen fire because  there was no flickering nor smoke nor was anything  falling from the object.  i was completely floored by the sight of it mostly because this was a relatively large size light , about half the size of my thumb at arms length and larger vertically than horizontally and yet no sound could be heard, no flickering of light such as all aircraft have fore and aft  and so i couldn't figure out what it was.  for a moment i entertained the possiblility it was a meteor and hoped that if it were one it would drop some material that i could retrieve.
 as i watched this light proceed in a north to south direction i noticed , again to my right, just over my right shoulder,  a quick movement and looking that direction i saw another light that seemed to swoop (for want of better way to explain how it appeared to fly) into view coming from a north to south direction and changed direction  immediately to a east west direction and then again to the same apparent direction as the other light which apppeared to be from north to south..  it assumed the same height and speed of the original light   and  was also orange and appeared to be on fire but with no flickering observed nor flame, smoke or matter emitted and it was completely silent.  there was also no wobbling nor wavering of either object in the sky..  the second  object, although seeming to be the same apparent size of the first object was more of a tear-drop shape than the other one and it had a rather spiky appearance to its light.  these objects appeared to be  entirely composed of light i could not make out any features. however they flew as if they were intelligently controlled, i mean they seemed to have purpose. 

i was thinking someone else must be able to see these objects, people were out  watching and shooting- off fireworks and so their was good  chance that someone was looking up at the sky at the time  --
i felt very excited seeing these objects because i've never seen anything like them before and i felt i was seeing a priviledged view of something spectacular  but by no means did i think i was the only one who could see these objects..  the big dipper was in the northwest sky and was setting..These objects were approximately half-way up the dipper or a degree or so more than  half way up the sky in my estimation, about the same height a small aircraft would fly and lower than a jet would fly. they were moving slower than i have observed any aircraft fly other than a blimp.  
 i have seen plenty  of aircraft in the skies   and none have ever had running lights as large as the size of these two , not even a helicopter's light appear as large  and helicopters i've seen in the near vicinity of my house always have had  white lights.  these lights were definitely not white but were quite orange tinged with golden yellow.

the two lights, (the second light had somewhat caught up  to the first light), continued to move steadily and at the same height in a southerly direction and i as watched them, looking from one to the other,  i noticed the first light  appear to turn to the west and began to get smaller as if fading out or even burning out?  i watched it completely disappear in less than a minute, less than fifteen seconds actually.  i looked back to the other light and at that moment  it too appeared to change direction, from moving south to moving to the west  and  it began to fade from sight appearing to be going west directly away from me straight ahead of me, as opposed to the first one which had traveled further south and therefore was at an angle to me (west/southwest) when it disappeared.  i was facing due west.  i did not take my eyes off of the second one  and i  watched it  as  it got progressively smaller until i could see only  a tiny white circle such as a star would appear in the distant sky  and it  seemed  to be very far away, but for all i know it had stayed in place and merely faded out.    it had  also taken less than a minute to disappear, that is,  for it to no longer appear to be present in the sky. there was nothing left in the sky along their apparent flight path   such as debris etc, smoke, or contrails.
i have seen planets in the night sky and they always appear to be sharply round or at least sharp in their outline  whereas these objects had irregular outlines and were brilliant in appearance, really beautiful in color   although neither gave  off a glow nor had a "halo"
 i don't know what happened to either object except they appeared to become progressively smaller until i could no longer see them at all.
  i scanned the sky for another hour on this clear night (with the full moon behind me) for anything even vaguely resembling what i saw but did not see anything moving in the sky , not even the occasional  aircraft i normally see in the evening. 

i have never seen anything like this before but im eighty percent sure there's an explanation other than an extraterrestrial one.
content.summary: Two orange irregular-shaped objects moved slowly nnorth to south and disappeared without a sound.

content.detailedDescription: Orange light leaving smokey trail,traveled as a plane would then descended as it vanished. thought plane blew up, check accuracy flight radar no flight. second thought looked like a missile trail as of a nasa launch of a shuttle. then noticed the smoke trail. the light was up maybe 5 mins. left a smoke from flames. dont believe in ufos but it was something!
content.summary: Orange light with smoke trail thought plane blew up

content.detailedDescription: The event lasted about a full minute or so. bright orange firey "solid" round/disc looking object slowly comes into our area. hovers above our houses for nearly a minute at very low altitude (~ 1000 ft above us, nearly directly overhead). at this time, the shape of the object began to reveal, and the bright orange fiery hue was toned way down. the shape was not flat-disc, but more like two cones base to base with longitudinal lighted stripes. as i stood there, hands on hips, shouting to the object "very interesting" over and over again it seemed to suddenly have the outline of a door (rectangle) come into view. then the object faded back quickly. it then turned into a small point of light and disappeared. the view could not have been better; time of day was perfect. it was so very close. the whole time there were sirens going also very close by as if a cop were in pursuit of this thing. our neighbors witnessed this event simultaneously from their backyard. when the craft was ascending into the sky we noticed an airplane in the vicinity.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange large low flying ufo slowly passes, then hovers over us. my wife and i in our backyard, neighbors in their backyard simultaneously witness event.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on the porch of my home and at approx. 11.45pm on july 6th 2012 a red glowing object high in the sky caught my attention as it was very bright and at first i thought it was a plane on fire.  the object was teardrop shape and looked as though it was on fire with something trailing beneath it.  there was no noise apparent.  it followed an arcing direction and i lost sight of it after approx. 2 mins. over the horizon.  it appeared to be fairly large as it was very visible in the sky and looked very high up.  i called my husband to come and see it as i was not sure what it was and wanted his opinion.  he saw it very visibly and was not sure what we were looking at - whether it was a weather balloon, plane on fire or something else.
content.summary: Red glowing object in sky over virginia beach va

content.detailedDescription:
the first sighting occured a few minutes before a 3rd of july fireworks show. i saw a light hovering over/behind a building that was perhaps a mile or more away. i thought it was a star or planet, as it was nearly nighttime. then, it began to move to the right, slowly at first, but gaining speed until it passed to my right at a distance of at least a mile, and an elevation of over a mile. at first, it looked almost exactly like a star. as it got closer, i could clearly see a disc shape with exterior lights. it passed behind trees and faded. my family discarded it as a helicopter, but they had never looked at it.
  the second sighting was during the fireworks, at night. i saw a stationary object hovering far behind where the fireworks were being launched. then, it too, picked up speed and faded in the distance. this one had three yellow lights on the edges and a red one in the center, none of which blinked.
   neither one made any noise, though the place was very crowded, so i can't be sure. i know that other people saw this, but most (or all) thought it was a helicopter/airplane. i am not so sure, as i live relatively close to an airport.
content.summary: 3rd of july double sighting during/before fireworks.

content.detailedDescription: Watering garden,9 pm,facing west.Observed orb 1/4 mile to the  west southwest.Orb traveling east northeast towards me ,approx. 200 foot agl at 15 mph.Full moon rising in the southeast. sw wind 8mph.Vis 10 miles.80 degrees.Orb continued to within 300 feet,made left turn ,heading due north.Appeared as a  red ,orange ,burning ember ,round,approx 15 foot in diameter,possible very small flames around the total perimeter.I phoned wife to turn off the back porchlight,run outside, look up and to her right,which she did.She observed the orb as well. her descripion is the same as mine.No sound at all. orb traveled approx 400 foot after it made its turn,then turned to the northwest.At this time i shined a very powerfull flashlight at it,blinking it 4 or 5 times.Orb instantly sped up ,traveling northwest,fading in 3 or 4 seconds. rural area, very quite.I remained outside with binos and camera for 1 hr. ,it did not return.Very familar with planes,choppers ,meteors,lantens,etc. ex naval air. this was a controled flight at low ground level,not some way out there fuzzy light.
content.summary: Red ,orange glowing  orb .15 mph,accelerates when flashlight is shined on it

content.detailedDescription: It was extremely bright and started in the middle of the sky and seemed to be hovering down then suddenly started moving away and was immediately gone.
content.summary: Large bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and i got a similar object to last night the vanished the same way and then i looked in the school yard and noticed two insanely bright white lights in the woods shinning at me and they shut off my camera when i went too zoom in on them. i checked out the area but couldn't find anything, as soon as i walked back to my house a helicopter flew over the area of the woods i was in.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a ufo like last night, vanished then noticed very bright lights in the tree line

content.detailedDescription: Huge glowing white bright orb light over north st pete with smaller orb at about 11oclock from larger object. stationary for over an hour. too big to be a plane, star or helicopter. remained stationary light pulsated .
content.summary: Huge glowing bright orb light over st pete with smaller orb at about 11oclock from larger object. stationary for over an hour

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the olive garden on route 38 in cherry hill, past the cherry hill mall. my daughter pointed out an object in the sky which appeared to be stationary.  as we drove, it was periodically obscured by trees.  my daughter thought it was rectangular, but when i saw it, it appeared to be a dull gray triangle.  it did not appear to be moving.  it was difficult for me to keep my eyes on it since i was driving.  when we stopped at a red light, a driver in the next lane had to slam on their brakes, which made me wonder if the driver was watching it, too, and missed the light changing.  when we turned around the jug handle on route 38, the object was no longer in site. the object did not appear to be a blimp, balloon, aircraft or other explainable object. when we pulled into the olive garden parking lot, we could no longer see it. only my daughter gemma and i saw it; my daughter kate, who was also in the car, did not see it.
content.summary: My daughter and i witnessed a stationary object in the sky in the daylight.  my daughter believed it was rectangular and i saw it as a gray triangle.

content.detailedDescription: Neighbor and i were talking poeple were sthooting off fireworks  as we talk he looked up and ask what was that  pointing to an orange glowing object about 1000  to 1500 feet in the air at first i said helecopter but their was no noise  it was steady going e to w  at about 150  to 300 miles like a small airplane prop it cast a orange light all around it and appeared tobe climing slowly passed over the freeway movingn towards lake then the light just blinked out
content.summary: Neighbor point to sky asked what that was  at first i said helicoper but there was nosound  it move in eastery direction then just poff it was gone

content.detailedDescription: While cleaning up after lighting fireworks in our culdesac five of us saw what appeared to be 2 bright orange orb like objects moving rapidly across the sky from the west. they turned towards the north and it looked like  possibly another orb was coming in from behind forming a boomerang shape. there also appeared to be an airplane following them. they hoovered for a short time and then moved at a very quick pace towards the north until we lost sight of them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange orbs hoovering above homes in northwest sky

content.detailedDescription: While cleaning up after lighting fireworks in our culdesac five of us saw what appeared to be 2 bright orange orb like objects moving rapidly across the sky from the west. they turned towards the north and it looked like  possibly another orb was coming in from behind forming a boomerang shape. there also appeared to be an airplane following them. they hoovered for a short time and then moved at a very quick pace towards the north until we lost sight of them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange orbs hoovering above homes in northwest sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving out of our tract, sun was beginning to set, summer evening and passenger window was down, husband driving when i got a feeling to put my head out the window and look up. thats when i saw the ufo.  out of fear i immediately put my head back into the car. fearing that someone would think i was going crazy i never told my story, not even to my husband until around 35 years later.

my question is why was i the only one to see it.  if someone else would of seen the same thing it would of been in the news or newpaper, since it was early evening.

someone told me that the reason it was only sighted by me was because it was done by mental telepathy.

since then i have had another experience that is somewhat strange.

i don't know what to think, but i know what i felt and saw.
content.summary: Round disk, gold lightning with an upper round center with lights on.
content.locationName: Mohican Dr. and Houston A, California

content.detailedDescription:
My family had just came inside and my brother stayed outside to have a smoke. he came running in the house yelling that he needs a camera because there is a triangle ufo over the house. we all (10 people kids and adults) ran outside to see 3 triangle ufo above the tree line floating over the house. as they moved another 10 or more orange orbs came behind. as they moved in an south east direction they started disappearing (each in the same place as the one in front). 
you have to know the neighborhood was packed full of people doing fireworks and there were no huge firework displays in troutdale on this day. these were not sparks from fireworks. they moved in triangle patterns. myself and a neighbor walked up the street to look beyond the tree line to see how many more where coming and if we could see anything else. they eventually all disappeared.
we thought they may have been chinese lanterns until i was doing research on the event and saw someone posted the same sighting but in ne/se portland which is 13 miles from troutdale, oregon. crazy stuff!!
content.summary: 3 triangle ufo's as well as 10 single orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and our daughter and me all went out into the street in front of our house to see the fireworks numerous people were setting off. we noticed a bright red/orange glow in the sky moving in a line, not up or down. we though maybe it had something to do with the fireworks but the object after about 5 minutes was still there and still moving. it was very low, below the cloud cover. at one point it vanished while we were watching it and we assumed it was something else. then about 2 minutes later we watched it reappear further in the distance of the direction it was heading. it then turned and started going in the opposite direction. then it again disappeared and we did not see it again.
content.summary: Spherical object, glowing a bright orange/red

content.detailedDescription: I was photographing the moon in front of my home in the city. the photos were taken at 12mp. when i reviewed the downloaded photos i had captured what appeared to be a black triangular shaped object in front of the moon. looking closely it appears that there are appendages at the rear of the triangle pointing down. i observed no lights (navigation etc) no engine noise and the object was not noticed by the human eye. it must have been moving quickly and had been captured by the cameras shutter at just the right moment. i am unsure what the object is. the black line at the top of the photo is a telephone line.
content.summary: Black triangle with appendages at bottom rear

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went outside after 9pm tuesday, july 3rd, to read and relax.  it has been so hot during the day that we missed being outside early in the evening, so this night we decided to take our travel chairs outside on the front patio and turn on the porch light to read.

then, i heard him say something above us looks odd.  we live a few miles from an airport that mostly has biplanes and an occasional jet; usually smaller engine type aircraft.  i looked up and right overhead was a flying vehicle that at first looked like it could have been a plane.  it was heading in a very slow northwest direction from the south.  as we watched it, we heard no engine hum; in fact, it gave no sound at all.  what struck us odd was that it had four perfectly spaced lights that were larger than those of higher flying planes.  typically well see planes with flashing strobe lights and the green/red starboard and port lights flashing as well.  the lights were perfectly spaced apart and solid, only the ones on the east and west sides (it was flying northward) flashed but not quickly like the typical planes lights.  we watched it slowly fly above us northward until it disappeared from sight.  it might have been a plane, but other planes in the area that night all gave a hum and the lights were smaller, brighter and had the green & red colors.  this "square object" was, from our standpoint, about the size of a quarter or 3/4" diameter.  as a comparison, the lights on the other planes at a similar, or higher, altitudes were the size of a small pointed felt-tipped marker, while the strange craft had lights the size of pencil eraser heads; definetely larger and not as bright or strobe-like.  it might have been a plane, but it was odd enough that we thought we should report it just the same.
content.summary: Four lights in square formation

content.detailedDescription: On july 4, 2012, in southern las vegas around 10:10 pm observed a bright orange pulsing/flickering object in the northeast sky. object approached very slowly then hovered and continued flickering and shimmering. the was no sound associated with the object's movement. object was bright orange with a fuzzy orange halo, appearing generally round. estimated distance was approximately 1 mile away, about 30 degrees off the horizon. the object/halo when hovering was about the size of a marble in an outstretched arms length. approach time from initial sighting was about 45 seconds, then object stopped and hovered in the sky. after about 45 seconds of hovering, the object began to fade and  moved slowly southwesterly. after about 20 seconds of slow movement, the object abruptly changed direction and accelerated to the south and disappeared. observed by three adults, each with scientific backgrounds. this was not a firework or flare, nor did it exhibit flight characteristics of any convention aircraft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object appeared from northeast cruising very slowly; stopped and hovered, bright orange flickered and pulsed, faded and abruptly moved south - first slow then accelerated

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10 pm, wednesday, july 4th. my wife and i were watching the july 4th celebration with keith lockhart performed on the esplanade in boston massachusetts. we took our dog charlotte outside, one last time for the evening when my wife said "chris, look!" i said "what?" she said, "there, look at that light." i looked up and right over the tree line was a bright orang light that appeared to be the size of a softball moving slowly without making a sound. i could see it moving steadily right above the tree line as it did ascend and change direction slightly. we only witnessed it for a couple of minutes. i thought the light might be flashing. my wife thought that it wasn't. perhaps looking at a moving object at night through branches of trees, caused it to look like lights were flashing. i couldn't smell, hear, feel any vibrations of any kind. it just quietly flew over the backyard leaving us to wonder what this was and why it would be flying over our backyard. i would love to hear if anyone else saw this. just an fyi. my wife and i have never reported this kind of occurrence before to anyone or to any medium. this is the first time i have seen something like this. neither of us were drinking or impaired in any way.
content.summary: Bright orange light, slowly moving silently witnessed by my wife and i.

content.detailedDescription: This object first appeared to be a small plane flying from north to south towards the copper basin development.Several of us observed this orange glowing cylinder with a dome top about the size of a car fly low and slow.The object was silent.It then turned towards the east and slowly faded out as it got further away.Absoutely the best 4th of july we will ever remember.Ive seen moving stars but never up close and in my area.
content.summary: Car size,orange glowing object from north heading south then east,flying very low and slow

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on deck at home and noticed in eastern sky, a little distance above the treeline, five (5)solid green orbs, no other colors or flashing lights, evenly spaced apart and moving in a straight line slowly from the south to the north...No sound.  the apparent distance and speed appeared same as the pattern of a typical jet.  however, jets generally fly east-west or west-east, as well as marking/flashing lights.  the sighting was observed, from south to north, approximately 15 minutes and out of our view.
content.summary: Observed 5 solid green orbs, no other colors or flashing lights,  evenly spaced apart moving in straight line slowly from the south to the north...No sound.  distance away and speed appeared same as pattern of a typical jet.

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying overnight at my friends house...I went outside in her backyard to have a cigarette before retiring for the evening.  i was very relaxed, enjoying how warm a night it was when all of a sudden out of nowhere, there appeared this bright neon green round/hexagon shaped object.  the object appeared as though it was breaking up into particles and dividing into two seperate objects but then it pulled back into one object and instead of it looking like it was particles breaking up, it became a solid bright neon green colour and in the center, it appeared to have a small black hole. then a purple haze appeared all around the outisde of it.  this object appeared through the open branches in a tree...It was hovering there approximately about 8 feet high...It looked to be the size of a basket ball...It was approximately 20 - 30 feet away from me.  this object made no sound, i surprisingly wasn't afraid of it, considering i was thinking it was not something of this planet, that i know of...I was captivated by it and i just smiled while looking at it wondering what the heck it was. i was extremely calm and in awe of this object. i witnessed this for about 1-2 minutes, max.  i came into the house to get my friend, i asked her to come quickly and within 30 seconds we came back outside, however, the object was no longer there.  

i am curious as to what this was and i would like to know if anyone else in this area, has reported experiencing anything similar?

thank you!
content.summary: I witnessed an orb like round/hexagon shaped object last night, which was a bright neon green in colour, with a purple outlined haze.

content.detailedDescription:
���  i had watched the evening flight of bats, observing their aerial acrobatics as they feed on mosquitos, gnats, etc.  nightfall came, but the unseasonably cool breeze was so pleasant, i continued to site in my backyard, relaxing.

  at 8:40 p.M. i witnessed the first of a series of 14 luminous objects.  each was glowing yellow with a bright red field which was fan-like above it and diminished as the object moved away from me, going northward.  there were several hundred yards between each with some variation.  the linear flight pattern of all 14 objects required less than 3 minutes to move across and disappear in the northern sky.  as each approached, it had the appearance of a large candle flame in the blackness of night.���

  ���  sworn statement:

  i am not a ufo buff.  my interest in the subject is no more than casual.  i am an avid camper and hiker.  in the hundreds of times i���ve camped under the starts, i have never seen anything in the night sky that i could not identify.  i have no explaination for the luminous objects i witnessed on 4 june, 2012.  all of the statements and descriptions i have made regarding these luminous objects are true to the best of my ability."
content.summary: Fourteen yellow objects with red aura observed for 2 to 3 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Right after the fireworks, which i estimate was around 10 pm, at alum creek dam, my family and i were in our boat motoring back to the dock and i looked up and noticed a glowing reddish-orange ball that seemed to float across the sky below the cloud cover. we listned to see if we could hear a motor or helicopter blades, but there was no sound. the object seemed to move at a good pace and the light was steady. we watched it until it disappeared into the cloud cover at the horizon. the orange glow was prominent when it was overhead, but not as much as it went farther away. it reminded me of the iss with the way it moved, but the color and the fact it was below the clouds made it clear it was not iss.
content.summary: Glowing orange sphere over alum creek dam area after the fireworks

content.detailedDescription: We were at claremore lake in oklahoma walking around looking for where fireworks were about to start.  a few fireworks began and while looking up we saw this strange red object.  it was glowing and seemed to be transparent with a white light emanating from inside.  we thought it was some kind of balloon at first but we realized right away that it was something very unusual.  we watched it float into the distance at a steady pace.  it appeared to stop and hover for a few minutes and then disappeared.   we were very excited because we knew we had seen something rare.
content.summary: Saw a strange red glowing orb floating in the sky near the fireworks display.  watched until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to smoke a cigarette, and i always look up in the sky at the moon and stars in the sky because i feel that they are beautiful.  i then hear this very loud airplane that was flying lower than normal for this area at that time of night, it was flying from the east heading west above poor mountain, once i seen it, i thought that plane was enormous it must have been air force one or a government plane.  i was looking towards the southwestern sky, and noticed what i thought was a star at first moving towards me in the sky, then it turned towards the eastern direction at rapid speed, i did not know what to think, once it got above me i could see the triangular shape and a black/grey color.  i then noticed a plane heading from the south right in the path of the ufo, the ufo then made an abrupt maneuver to avoid the plane and continued on its eastern path at a rapid speed, then just disappeared.  a few minutes later, i witnessed a black helicopter heading in the same direction as the ufo, as well as various types of planes a few minutes later, sort of like they were chasing the ufo.  i immediately went inside and told my girlfriend what i had witnessed, she believed me because this type of story is not normally what comes out of my mouth.  i personally did not know what to think and could not believe what i had witnessed and did not know what to do.  as the night went on, i started to have these weird feelings of getting really hot, and exhausted like i had run a marathon, and that is not normally me, that may not have anything to do with what i saw but i can't explain the feelings my body was having, it was out of the ordinary. i hope that you will be able to tell me what i saw, so i know that i am not crazy.
content.summary: Looked like a star at first, then noticed moving fast and changed directions to avoid another aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home and it was 4:00 am. in the morning on 7/6/2012 and i got up with my husband as he was getting around for work. i just happened to look out our bedroom window because the full moon was so bright. and i saw these big yellowish orange orbs among the tree line. i called to my husband to come and see them. after he left for work i continued to watch them and they started moving they would go up and down and then side ways really fast. and they would dim and come back on again. i watched this until they disappeared which was a little after 5:00 am. and there were no airplanes or any other aircraft of any sort in the area of this. and this is not the first time we have seen something like this here. my husband and i both have seen things many times over the years since 1997. we were always afraid of the ridicule if we would have reported it. when we see these things here in the sky it scares me but yet i'm fascinated by it.
content.summary: I saw 2 yellowish oranges orbs of light that looked like they were pretty big.
